plot: Kirsty is beset with worry upon realising that Ruby has been taken. Tyrone and Fiz's escape is thwarted. Faye takes advantage of Sylvia's trust to slip out and find Tim. Gail asks a big favour of Nick.
title: "Coronation Street" Episode #1.8057
plot_es: Kirsty is beset with worry upon realising that Ruby has been taken. Tyrone and Fiz's escape is thwarted. Faye takes advantage of Sylvia's trust to slip out and find Tim. Gail asks a big favour of Nick.
plot_en: Kirsty is beset with worry upon realising that Ruby has been taken. Tyrone and Fiz's escape is thwarted. Faye takes advantage of Sylvia's trust to slip out and find Tim. Gail asks a big favour of Nick.
